title: Upshot Agency
summary: Upshot.agency was a complete site rebuild using React.js and scss. It is hosted using a static build on AWS's Elastic Beanstalk.

title: Mazola Turkey Frying
summary: Mazola Turkey Frying is a React.Js app built for Mazola Corn Oil. It utilizes Scss styling and React's useful modal package and is hosted on Heroku.

title: Edge Marketing
summary: Edge Marketing was a complete site rebuild using HubSpot

title: Packers Bacon Sweepstakes
summary: Packers Bacon Sweeps is a site built for Patrick Cudahy Bacon. It is built in React.js and utilizes formik.js for its form validation. The entryform is validated by Google Recaptcha and saved in a Mongo Database via Compose.io.

title: Pacifico Preserves
summary: Pacifico Preserves is a single page React.JS app built using React and Scss and is hosted on Heroku.

title: Pineridge Farms
summary: Pineridge Farms Pork was a complete website rebuild using Wordpress and hosted on AWS's Elastic Beanstalk.

title: Not Your Fathers Quiz
summary: A simple quiz to determine your ideal night in. Built with Wordpress and hosted on AWS's Elastic Beanstalk.

title: Plainfield Fishing Resort
summary: A freelance website built for the Plainfield Fishing Resort using bootstrap, css, and javascript and hosted on Github.
